name: DAI on PulseChain
description: DAI on PulseChain is the copied version of DAI on Ethereum, which was part of the worlds largest free airdrop at PulseChain's inception. DAI on PulseChain, or "pDAI," is a speculative future stablecoin which started with zero value and could grow to reach parity with its Ethereum counterpart at $1.00 USD. Copied or "forked" contracts from Ethereum on the PulseChain network are experimental. This project seeks to be the first third-party forked token to operate like its original version on the Ethereum network.
